duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop state-of-the-art flow cytometry and potency assays to support preclinical and clinical-stage cell therapies.
Contribute to scientific strategy for regulatory acceptance of biological assays in clinical development.
Generate and document results, experimental design, execution, data review and analysis, document writing, and contribution to regulatory submissions.
Collaborate with stakeholders in partner organizations on technical and strategic activities.

education_certification.credential: PhD in immunology, cell biology, or related discipline (or MS with relevant experience)
